actions.name: North Wind

cost.trigger: The user enters battle, or emerges from stealth.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user enters battle, or emerges from stealth.

Effect: Connection - Aurora Veil. The user freely uses Aurora Veil. The user is immune to negative effects from Snowy Weather.
